---
id: describe-forbid-user-rules
title: "DescribeForbidUserRules"
description: "Query user prohibition rules."
api: 
info_path: core_products/real-time-voice-video/en/server/api-reference/room/forbid-user-rule/open-api-desc
---

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>DescribeForbidUserRules</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/"}></MethodEndpoint>


Query user prohibition rules.
<Note title="Rate Limit">All rooms under the same AppID: 10 times/second.</Note>
<Warning title="Notice">
Calling the `DescribeForbidUserRules` interface allows you to query both currently active rules and expired rules. **Please note that ZEGOCLOUD periodically purges expired prohibition rules from the database, so the list of expired rules returned by this interface may be incomplete.**
</Warning>
